basics.name: Sergei Ievlev
basics.label: Qualiti Assurance Engineer
basics.summary:
I have over a decade of experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer, specializing in embedded systems testing. My focus is on enhancing the quality of the final product to create the best user experience by developing processes with the team and using proven technologies. I work closely with developers, analysts, and product owners to initiate testing as early as possible, reducing the cost of bugs and minimizing their occurrence.
I prioritize solving problems through clear communication and am always willing to assist the testing team with their routine and questions related to principles and methodologies. I believe it is crucial to make the testing process results visible to the team. In addition to strong hard skills, I excel at communicating and finding approaches to team members to make our collaboration as comfortable and effective as possible.
Currently, I am based in Berlin and interested in advancing my career as a Senior QA Engineer or Head of QA.

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
